DataElement.preferredName: Adult Health Behavior Smoking Status Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe whether or not a person smokes, has quit smoking or has never smoked.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human who has reached reproductive age.:Behaviors expressed by individuals to protect, maintain or promote their health status. For example, proper diet, and appropriate exercise are activities perceived to influence health status. Life style is closely associated with health behavior and factors influencing life style are socioeconomic, educational, and cultural._An indication of a person's current tobacco and nicotine consumption as well as some indication of smoking history.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A human who has reached reproductive age.:Behaviors expressed by individuals to protect, maintain or promote their health status. For example, proper diet, and appropriate exercise are activities perceived to influence health status. Life style is closely associated with health behavior and factors influencing life style are socioeconomic, educational, and cultural.

Concepts.definition: An age group comprised of humans who have reached reproductive age.
The actions taken by an individual to maintain, attain, and protect their good health. Health behavior reflects a person's health beliefs.

Property.preferredDefinition: An indication of a person's current tobacco and nicotine consumption as well as some indication of smoking history.

Concepts.definition: An indication of a person's current tobacco and nicotine consumption as well as some indication of smoking history.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released 7/24/10 per NHIS2005 model owner. mc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._A condition or state at a particular time._Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

PermissibleValues.value: I have never smoked or smoked less than 100 cigarettes in my life time

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who was not smoking at the time of the interview and has smoked less than 100 cigarettes in their life.

Concepts.definition: A person who has never smoked at the time of the interview or has smoked less than 100 cigarettes in their life.

PermissibleValues.value: I have smoked in the past, but quit over a year ago
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Past Smoker Stop Greater Than Last Year

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Past Smoker Stop Greater Than Last Year
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.: A person who inhales or has inhaled combustible products of organic material during their lifetime.: Put an end to a state or an activity.: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.

Concepts.definition: Before the present time.
A person who inhales or has inhaled combustible products of organic material during their lifetime.
Put an end to a state or an activity.
A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

PermissibleValues.value: I have smoked in the past, but quit within the last year

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.: A person who inhales or has inhaled combustible products of organic material during their lifetime.: Put an end to a state or an activity.: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.

Concepts.definition: Before the present time.
A person who inhales or has inhaled combustible products of organic material during their lifetime.
Put an end to a state or an activity.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

PermissibleValues.value: I have smoked in the past, but quit within the last 6 month
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Past Smoker Stop Last Six Month

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Past Smoker Stop Last Six Month
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.: A person who inhales or has inhaled combustible products of organic material during their lifetime.: Put an end to a state or an activity.: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.: A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.definition: Before the present time.
A person who inhales or has inhaled combustible products of organic material during their lifetime.
Put an end to a state or an activity.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

PermissibleValues.value: I have smoked in the past, but quit within the last 1 month
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Past Smoker Stop Last One Month

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Past Smoker Stop Last One Month
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.: A person who inhales or has inhaled combustible products of organic material during their lifetime.: Put an end to a state or an activity.: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.definition: Before the present time.
A person who inhales or has inhaled combustible products of organic material during their lifetime.
Put an end to a state or an activity.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An adult who has smoked 100 cigarettes in his or her lifetime and who currently smokes cigarettes. Includes daily smokers and non-daily smokers (also known as occasional smokers).

Concepts.definition: An adult who has smoked 100 cigarettes in his or her lifetime and who currently smokes cigarettes. Includes daily smokers and non-daily smokers (also known as occasional smokers).

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added OBIB alternate name and identifier DW 03-21-2019

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

Concepts.definition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe.
A condition or state at a particular time.
A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.
